duration_in_months: For one year from the date of contract with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to three (3) additional one-year periods
full_summary:
### Tree and Shrub Maintenance Services

#### Request for Proposal

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Morden Research and Development Centre is soliciting proposals for Tree and Shrub Maintenance services. The services will be provided on an as-and-when-requested basis to support the centre's research and development activities.

**Contract Period and Term**

The contract will be for a period of one year, with an option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods. The anticipated start date is August 1, 2023.

**Security Requirements**

There are no security requirements associated with this requirement.

**Site Visit Information**

A site visit will be held on July 12, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. CDT. Bidders are requested to confirm their attendance by July 11, 2023, and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

**Mandatory Technical Requirements**

Bidders must meet the mandatory technical evaluation criteria outlined in the solicitation documents.

**Selection Criteria**

The contract will be awarded to the bidder who submits the most comprehensive and technically suitable proposal, with the lowest price.

**Indigenous Procurement**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has adopted the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) to increase visibility and business opportunities for Indigenous businesses. Interested bidders are encouraged to register with the IBD and consider this requirement.

**Documents and Submissions**

The solicitation documents and bid packages are available on the Canada Buys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/solicitation-opportunities. Bidders are responsible for regularly checking the website for updates and amendments.

---

Contact Information:

* Name: Camille Sobczak, Procurement Officer
* Email: camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (204) 430-5426
